name: Dessert Wheel
description:
Feel like dessert, but not sure what to choose?

Spin the wheel and see what fate decides for you.

If you don't agree with fate, press the "Spin Again" button.

Not in a restaurant, or coffee shop, click the "Near Me" button and it will take you to Google Maps for a place near you.

Enjoy. 

More wheels coming soon. Checkout the Meal Wheel Meal Wheel
